title: What is the best way to remove algae from the upper story of my house? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most people recommend a fungicide to kill it off. However, I just use a pump up sprayer, and bleach. I use it straight..just spray it on..on a DRY day. Within a couple of days I see it die right off. Only costs me a few bucks..and won't harm the critters. Good luck!✌
Power washing with bleach solution or other non harmful clensing agents or algecides is likely the most economical and practical.
